name: Boxy (gnitsaf)
description:
Boxy is a small time killer.  It's my first actual program in godot that wasn't built based on tutorials or public assets.  I created all the assets in the game, the sounds, music and code.  I like the music but I don't know that they go together.  I've included the source files for anyone interested in what's under the hood. 

GAME: Click towards the top of the screen to drop a box. Try to get them inside the yellow stripped area.  The longer they stay, the higher the score.  play again to beat your high score (resets after current session)

This is a learning project for me. Any updates to it will be done with that in mind.

Thanks! 

Aseprite - graphics

BoscaCeoil and Beep-Box - music

ChipTone- sfx

Godot - game engine
